title: help me!
body: when i try to turn on my league client it blinks and disappears please help me  fix this problem!

replies.body: This could be caused by a few factors, but restart your PC just in case something crashed in the background.  There might also be a connection problem that's struggling to reach the patching server and get the client to launch.  The steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help, with special attention to port forwarding to get you squared away.
try to use [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to re-download the last patch again.
